content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "purple_carpet", "quantity": 42, "index": 12}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 52, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 30, "index": 15}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 16}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 19}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 27}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 6, "index": 29}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "glass_bottle", "quantity": 43, "index": 39}, {"type": "crimson_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 20, "index": 42}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 44, "index": 43}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a wooden_sword, I need to first craft oak_planks. Oak_planks can be crafted by placing a log in the crafting table. I have a stripped_oak_wood at slot 34, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purple_carpet", "quantity": 42, "index": 12}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 52, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 30, "index": 15}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 16}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 19}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 27}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 6, "index": 29}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "glass_bottle", "quantity": 43, "index": 39}, {"type": "crimson_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 20, "index": 42}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 44, "index": 43}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "purple_carpet", "quantity": 42, "index": 12}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 52, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 30, "index": 15}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 16}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 19}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 27}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 6, "index": 29}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "glass_bottle", "quantity": 43, "index": 39}, {"type": "crimson_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 20, "index": 42}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 44, "index": 43}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]

thought: Now that I have oak_planks in my inventory, I can start crafting the wooden_sword. A wooden_sword requires placing 2 oak_planks vertically in the crafting table, so I will first move 1 oak_plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
